title: Teine Samoa: a girl of Samoa
creator_credit: Gibson Film Productions, Dave Gibson and John Anderson
brief_description: The story of Situe, a 19 year old girl living in a small village in the Pacific Islands of Western Samoa. Through her eyes, the film looks at village life and the expectations of the young educated girl who is faced with the choice of either remaining with her family or seeking a life further afield.
